TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {10194=Ralco Agencies Ltd., Special/Extraordinary Shareholders Meeting, Jan 12, 2015., at 11:00 Israel Standard Time., 10664=Ralco Agencies Ltd., Special/Extraordinary Shareholders Meeting, Oct 29, 2014., at 11:00 Israel Standard Time., 4817=Ralco Agencies Ltd. imports and distributes various consumer products in Israel. The company distributes refrigerators, LCD TVs, microwave ovens, built-in ovens, hobs, free-standing cookers, washing machines, dryers, and dishwashers. It also sells surplus and lightly damaged goods to importers and manufacturers through on-line. Ralco Agencies Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Azur, Israel., 11134=Ralco Agencies Ltd., Special/Extraordinary Shareholders Meeting, Dec 22, 2013., at 11:00 Israel Standard Time.}
